      /**

     * Matalan UI Kit Colors

     */



    $white: #fff;

    $black: #000;



    /* 

     * BRanding colours

     */

    $matalan-brand: #eb0000;

    $dark-grey: #383838;

    $cool-grey: #b2b3b5;

    $light-grey: #ececec;



    /* 

     * Supporting Colors - requested names tbc

     */

    $supp-gold: #ffb400;

    $supp-orange: #fe6001;

    $supp-magenta: #e51d9b;

    $supp-purple: #690b7a;



    /* 

     * Web Coloursr

     */

    $matalan-brand-hover: #c11e2a;

    $dark-grey-hover: #2d2a2b;

    $cool-grey-hover: #a2a2a3;

    $light-grey-hover: #f5f5f5;

    $keyline-color: #e0e0e2;

      
    
      /* 

     * Mappings

     */

    $primary-color: $matalan-brand;

    $primary-color-hover: $matalan-brand-hover;

    $secondary-color: $light-grey;


    /* 

     * Fading primary color

     */

    $primary-lighten-100

    $primary-lighten-90

Typography

Body Copy

Matalan's global default font-size is 14px, with a line-height of 20px. This is applied to the <body> and all paragraphs. In addition, <p> (paragraphs) receive a bottom margin of half their line-height (10px by default).

Primary Font

Helvetica Neue

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ

abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz

h2. Heading 2

h3. Heading 3

h4. Heading 4

h5. Heading 5
h6. Heading 6

Buttons

Buttons (_components/_c-button.scss)

Button styles

Buttons default to light grey style, but a number of functional classes can be applied for different color sytles

Primary Buttons

+ Default Default hover Default focus Default disabled 
              //primary button
<a class="c-btn c-btn-primary">Default</a>

Secondary Buttons

+ Default Default hover Default focus Default disabled 
              //secondary button
<a class="c-btn c-btn-secondary">Default</a>

Button Groups (_objects/_o-button-grp.scss)

Buttons groups can be displayed horzontally or verticlally and grouped together with any combination of button. e.g. Standalone button, dropdown button, split dropdown button

Button Groups Default

elit sint cillum
est 
                //primary horizontal button group

                  <div class="o-btn-group">

                    <a class="c-btn c-btn-primary">Item-1</a>

                    <a class="c-btn c-btn-primary">Item-2</a>

                    <a class="c-btn c-btn-primary c-btn-dropdown">Item-3

                      <span class="caret"></span>

                    </a>

                    <div class="c-btn-grp-dropdown">

                      <a class="c-btn c-btn-primary">Item-4</a>

                      <a class="c-btn c-btn-primary c-btn-dropdown">

                        <span class="caret"></span>

                      </a>

                    </div>

                  </div>
consectetur voluptate
qui 
                //secondary horizontal button group

                  <div class="o-btn-group">

                    <a class="c-btn c-btn-primary">Item-1</a>

                    <a class="c-btn c-btn-primary">Item-2</a>

                    <a class="c-btn c-btn-primary c-btn-dropdown">Item-3

                      <span class="caret"></span>

                    </a>

                    <div class="c-btn-grp-dropdown">

                      <a class="c-btn c-btn-primary">Item-4</a>

                        <span class="caret"></span>

                      </a>

                    </div>

                  </div>

Button Groups Vertical

sit consequat sunt 
                  //primary vertical button group

                    <div class="o-btn-group-vertical">

                     <a class="c-btn c-btn-primary">Item-1</a>

                     <a class="c-btn c-btn-primary">Item-2</a>

                     <a class="c-btn c-btn-primary c-btn-dropdown">Item-3

                      <span class="caret"></span>

                     </a>

                    </div>
magna nostrud laborum 
                  //secondary vertical button group

                    <div class="o-btn-group-vertical">

                     <a class="c-btn c-btn-secondary">Item-1</a>

                     <a class="c-btn c-btn-secondary">Item-2</a>

                     <a class="c-btn c-btn-secondary c-btn-dropdown">Item-3

                      <span class="caret"></span>

                     </a>

                    </div>

Dropdowns (_components/_c-button.scss)

Dropdown styling

Dropdowns can easily be created from standard buttons by adding c-btn-dropdown class and appending a span with a class of caret

Dropdown Buttons

Default
Default 
                  //primary dropdown button

                    <a class="c-btn c-btn-primary c-btn-dropdown">Default<span class="caret"></span></a>


                    //secondary dropdown button

                    <a class="c-btn c-btn-secondary c-btn-dropdown">Default<span class="caret"></span></a>

Split Dropdown Buttons

Default 1 
                  //primary split dropdown button

                    <div class="c-btn-grp-dropdown">

                      <a class="c-btn c-btn-primary">Default</a>

                      <a class="c-btn c-btn-primary c-btn-dropdown">

                        <span class="caret"></span>

                      </a>

                    </div>
Default 2 
                  //secondary split dropdown button

                    <div class="c-btn-grp-dropdown">

                      <a class="c-btn c-btn-secondary">Default</a>

                      <a class="c-btn c-btn-secondary c-btn-dropdown">

                        <span class="caret"></span>

                      </a>

                    </div>

Search

Sitewide search tool. Selected and de-selected

Search
Search 
              //Default Form - add class of has-focus to highlight in red

                <form class="form-inline c-search-form has-focus">

                  <div class="o-form-row">

                    <div class="o-form--input-group o-form-input--contain span-wide-6">

                      <div class="input-group--addon unstyled input-group--addon__inset">

                        <i class="icon-search"></i>

                      </div>

                      <input type="text" class="input--textual input-addon--expand input-group--addon__inset-left" placeholder="Enter Keyword or Product Code">

                      <a href="" class="input-group--addon unstyled c-search__button">Search</a>

                    </div>

                  </div>

                </form>

                <li class="c-breadcrumb-bar__item has-link"><a href="">Breadcrumb</a></li>

                <li class="c-breadcrumb-bar__item has-link"><a href="">Breadcrumb</a></li>

                <li class="c-breadcrumb-bar__item no-link">Breadcrumb</li>

              </ul>

Tabs & Pills(..)

Tabs and pills are horizontal by default, just add a second class, .nav-stacked, to make them appear vertically stacked.

Pills Horizontal

  • Home
  • Profile
  • Messages
  • Settings
Pills Horizontal. consectetur adipisicing elit. Reiciendis temporibus dolores at ut maiores.

Pagination (..)

Simple pagination inspired by Rdio, great for apps and search results.

Previous and next links for pagination.

Previous
« 1 2 3 4 5 »
Next 
              //Pagination

                <div class="pagination-bar">

                  <div class="pagination-bar__prev">

                    <a href="" class="c-btn c-btn-paginate__alt">Previous</a>

                  </div>

                  <div class="pagination-bar__list o-btn-group">

                    <a href="" class="c-btn c-btn-paginate__alt">&laquo;</a>

                    <a href="" class="c-btn c-btn-paginate">1</a>

                    <a href="" class="c-btn c-btn-paginate">2</a>

                    <a href="" class="c-btn c-btn-paginate">3</a>

                    <a href="" class="c-btn c-btn-paginate">4</a>

                    <a href="" class="c-btn c-btn-paginate">5</a>

                    <a href="" class="c-btn c-btn-paginate__alt">&raquo;</a>

                  </div>

                  <div class="pagination-bar__next">

                    <a href="" class="c-btn c-btn-paginate__alt">Next</a>

                  </div>

                </div>

do incididunt pariatur cupidatat incididunt

sint tempor consectetur excepteur ad sint qui proident commodo eiusmod ×

Progress Bars (_components/_progress.scss)

Progress bars

Progress Bars are available in gradient, stripped and stacked versions.

Basic

75%

Striped

75% 
      //Checkout Bars

        <progress class="c-progress c-progress-striped" value="75" max="100">

          //IE9 Fallback

          <div class="c-progress">

            <span class="c-progress-bar" style="width: 75%;">75%</span>

          </div>

        </progress>

Checkout Progress

the "completed" class to the li adds the tick, the active is the current position and no class are the remaining

Chcekout

Validation States

Matalan has various validation styles for error, warning, info, and success messages. To use, add the appropriate class to the surrounding .o-form-row

Validation States

      // Validation states for forms

        <form class="o-form-inline-fixed__threecol">


        // Warnings

          <div class="o-form-row form-validate__warning">

            <div class="o-form-label--contain">

              <label class="o-form-label__primary">Input with warning</label>

            </div>

            <div class="o-form-input--contain">

              <input type="text" class="input--textual" placeholder="placeholder" />

            </div>

            <div class="o-form-message--contain">

              <label class="o-form-label__message">Something may have gone wrong</label>

            </div>

          </div>


        // Errors

          <div class="o-form-row form-validate__error">

            <div class="o-form-label--contain">

              <label class="o-form-label__primary">Input with error</label>

            </div>

            <div class="o-form-input--contain">

              <input type="text" class="input--textual" placeholder="placeholder" />

            </div>

            <div class="o-form-message--contain">

              <label class="o-form-label__message">Please correct the error</label>

            </div>

          </div>


        // Information

          <div class="o-form-row form-validate__info">

            <div class="o-form-label--contain">

              <label class="o-form-label__primary">Input with info</label>

            </div>

            <div class="o-form-input--contain">

              <input type="text" class="input--textual" placeholder="placeholder" />

            </div>

            <div class="o-form-message--contain">

              <label class="o-form-label__message">Username is taken</label>

            </div>

          </div>


        // Succes

          <div class="o-form-row form-validate__success">

            <div class="o-form-label--contain">

              <label class="o-form-label__primary">Input with success</label>

            </div>

            <div class="o-form-input--contain">

              <input type="text" class="input--textual" placeholder="placeholder" />

            </div>

            <div class="o-form-message--contain">

              <label class="o-form-label__message">Whohoo!</label>

            </div>

          </div>



        </form>

Form controls

Examples of standard form controls supported in an example form layout.

Inputs

          //Text Input

            <div class="o-form-row">

              <div class="o-form-label--contain">

                <label class="o-form-label__primary">Text Input</label>

              </div>

              <div class="o-form-input--contain">

                <input type="text" class="input--textual" placeholder="Text Input" />

              </div>

            </div>
@
          //Prepended

            <div class="o-form-row">

              <div class="o-form-label--contain">

                <label class="o-form-label__primary">Prepended</label>

              </div>

              <div class="o-form--input-group o-form-input--contain">

                <div class="input-group--addon">@</div>

                <input type="text" class="input--textual input-addon--expand" placeholder="Username">

              </div>

            </div>
.00
          //Prepended

            <div class="o-form-row">

              <div class="o-form-label--contain">

                <label class="o-form-label__primary">Appended</label>

              </div>

              <div class="o-form--input-group o-form-input--contain">

                <input type="text" class="input--textual input-addon--expand" placeholder="Username">

                <div class="input-group--addon">.00</div>

              </div>

            </div>

Tables

Default style

For basic styling—light padding and horizonal stripes.

# First Name Last Name Username
1 Gaz Battersby @iamgaz
2 Gaz Battersby @iamgaz
4 Gaz Battersby @iamgaz 
      // Tables

        <table class="c-table c-table__default c-table__striped">

          <thead>

            <tr>

              <th>#</th>

              <th>First Name</th>

              <th>Last Name</th>

              <th>Username</th>

            </tr>

          </thead>

          <tbody>

            <tr>

              <td>1</td>

              <td>Gaz</td>

              <td>Battersby</td>

              <td>@iamgaz</td>

            </tr>

          </tbody>

        </table>
